channel.title: How do i add an object to a different level than 0? PI 317
channel.description: How do I go about adding an object to a second story (heightlevel 1) in a PI 317 server (erasedPKZ)?

item.title: How do i add an object to a different level than 0? PI 317
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

go into ObjectManager.Java

Located, src/server/world/ObjectManager.Java

search for

public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {

under that add this

if(c.heightLevel == 1) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(OBJ ID, X, Y, Face, Type); }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add an object to a different level than 0? PI 317
